lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.

You are sitting in English class, snickering at the substitute teacher, when you realize you have completely forgotten to do your Math homework. Math is next period. You know Jody will pass you the work so you can copy it.
You ask Jody if you can "borrow" her homework.
She slips it onto your desk.
Every line you copy seems to take forever.
Your underarms begin to sweat. The teacher almost catches you about 50 times.
Suddenly, you are called on to answer a question.
You are startled. You say, "Moby Dick," and wait to hear the screams and howls of your classmates.
Jody turns to you and says, "I don't know HOW you do it."
The teacher walks over to you and asks to see your notes.
You are SURE you are going to get suspended.
The bell rings. It's time to switch classes.

You hand in the work that you copied. Since you had both of the papers, they were right on top of each other when you handed them in. The teacher immediately knows the two of you copied each other's homework. You are both
